works.description:
Dear Google Team, the image of three  
stuffed manicotti topped with tomato sauce and a little bit of cheese is  
mine. I have personally cooked it and photographed it for my recipe  
website. The infringing site is definitely a repeat offender, because this
 
is not the first time I've been reporting them for DMCA infringment. I
have  
replaced the reported image on my original page with higher quality of the
 
same image, because it seems to me that a lot of times sites that copy my 

images rank higher with my own images and therefore stealing my income
from  
google ads. Thank you for your time.
